Octavia BOT 02-11-2022 02:49

It was not often it came up, but could not be ignored none-the-less. Regardless, she found herself traipsing through dreamland, scouring a path back to reality. She wakes to lucidity as she makes her way through the dense shrub, far from the comfort of her warm, albeit squalid bed. Barefoot, she feels the dirt beneath her feet and knows she has hit the right path to the crone who spoke so surreptitiously to her, the sharp taste of ash in the wind and the fine dirt between her toes told Aphiel this, was the path.

Wiz-DM BOT 05-11-2022 04:41
Barovia‚Äôs newest undead leave the hag‚Äôs hut. Heading towards Ravenloft Castle. The idea of being undead finally settles on them. Though they are in the swap, they are not bothered by the stench. No smells fill their nostrils. As the night chill hits their skin, there is no reaction, no goosebumps, no response at all. Just a dull acknowledgement it is cold. The most surprising difference is the sound. If anything the sounds of the environment are clearer. No longer drowned out by the instinctively ignored sounds of blood flowing through veins. The now missing heartbeat and the previous ever constant gurgle of digestion. On digestion, there is now a consistent feeling of hunger. Without the limitations of smell and taste, every passing local fauna seems a means to satiate this hunger. The mosquitos which now ignore them. The croaking frogs and scurrying rats. Though they each hide it well, the undead cannot ignore the thoughts of sinking their teeth into the warm flesh of these creatures. Meanwhile Fritz walks by the party, oblivious to his comrade‚Äôs novel experiences.

The purple threads finish tieing themselves tightly, and the woman known as Linera now dangled limp like a puppet in the hands of The Ghoul Octavia. (edited)
